articles.title: Dutch Woman Chooses Euthanasia Due To Untreatable Mental Health Struggles - NDTV
articles.description: The procedure will take place at ter Beek's home. Her doctor will first administer a sedative, followed by medication to stop her heart.
articles.content:
Zoraya ter Beek's case has sparked debate.
A 28-year-old Dutch woman named Zoraya ter Beek will undergo euthanasia in May due to severe mental health struggles, according to The Free Press. Ter Beek… [+2026 chars]
